name.ja: ケミカライザー・ウィング

requirement.en: When a monster(s) on your field is destroyed by an opponent's attack or their card effect, shuffle 2 FIRE Attribute monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.

effect.en: Destroy 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster on your opponent's field. Then, you can Special Summon 1 "Chemicalize Salamander" from your Graveyard face-up to your field.
